alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 30 at 6:47PM MST until January 31 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills between 25 below and 35 below zero. Around Casper, wind chills are expected to range between 15 below and 25 below zero. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range and Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...Until 9 AM Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The most susceptible parts of the body to frostbite are the extremities such as fingers, toes and the tip of the nose. If you must go outside, try to stay out of the wind, and dress in several layers of loose fitting, lightweight, warm clothing.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
